name: Giovanni Trovato
title: iOS Developer
profile: Experienced iOS Developer with 7+ years of experience building secure, high-performance mobile apps using Swift and SwiftUI. Skilled in modern Apple frameworks, CI/CD, and RESTful integrations. Passionate about clean code, mentoring, and continuous learning.

experience.title: iOS Developer
details: Developed and maintained iOS applications distributed via App Store and MDM.
Worked in cross-functional SCRUM teams with Backend, Web, and QA.
Implemented automated CI/CD pipelines using GitLab, Fastlane, and Jenkins.
Integrated secure authentication flows with OAuth2 / OpenID Connect.
Introduced clean architecture patterns and mentored junior developers.

experience.title: Mobile Developer
details: Developed features across Android and iOS platforms in an agile setting.
Refactored legacy UI with modern design components and improved performance.
Created internal libraries to speed up development.

education.description: Acquired skills to design, develop, deploy and maintain mobile applications for end users or for integration into complex information systems. Gained deep knowledge of the Cocoa Touch framework (iOS), Android and Windows Universal App. Technologies used included Swift, Objective-C, Java, XAML and XML.

Graduated with a thesis on 'Capacitive sensors applications to silicon electrodes on a mold for RTM technology'. Designed and built a flexible physical sensor, all supporting electronics, and custom software to analyze data.
